page.title: 19TOURISM
page.content:
This is a popular area for tourists.
The Riviera Lido is a small{holiday {camp,}a kilometre from the sea. It has a swimming pool, children's playground, bowling facilities, a residents' bar, gift shop and courts for tennis, squash and badminton.
The Church Farm{caravan site}is situated close to Pagham harbour, by the Lagoon. There are over 750 caravans. The Church Farm club, cafe and supermarket are for the holiday makers. The main attraction of the site is the beach, which is fairly busy at holiday times.
Pagham Harbour{Nature Reserve}is used for bird watching and picnicking. People fish off the harbour mouth.
